title: (x) Mathematical typeface used in LaTex - Computer Modern {Stephen}
content:
My friend showed me this typeface they use for Financing in a protocol called LaTex. I can’t indentify it.

Thanks!

| --- | --- |

 [‹ Trajan-like capitals on Joy Division "Closer" album cover by Peter Saville](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201114433/http:/typophile.com/node/32322 "Go to previous forum topic") [Old-school type ID: somewhere between Futura & Univers ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201114433/http:/typophile.com/node/32381 "Go to next forum topic")
author: DaveG

comments.content: I have just checked it with my LaTeX installation. It is Computer Modern.
